Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.listener

Interface DynamicSnackbar

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicActivity, DynamicDrawerActivity, DynamicPermissionsActivity, DynamicThemeActivity, DynamicTutorialActivity, DynamicWidgetActivity
    public interface DynamicSnackbar
    An interface to show themed Snackbar dynamically.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(int stringRes)
      Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

      Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

      Make a themed snackbar with text and action.
      com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(java.lang.CharSequence text, int duration)
      Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

    • Method Detail

      • getSnackbar

        @NonNull
com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(@NonNull
                                                          java.lang.CharSequence text,
                                                          int duration)
        Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

        The background of the snackbar will be the tint background color to blend it smoothly and it will automatically use its tint color for the text and action to provide best visibility.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        duration - The duration of the snackbar.

        BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_SHORT, BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_LONG or BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_INDEFINITE.

        Returns:
        The snackbar with the supplied parameters.

        Use Snackbar.show() to display the snackbar.

      • getSnackbar

        @NonNull
com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(@StringRes
                                                          int stringRes,
                                                          int duration)
        Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

        The background of the snackbar will be the tint background color to blend it smoothly and it will automatically use its tint color for the text and action to provide best visibility.

        Parameters:
        stringRes - The string resource for the snackbar.
        duration - The duration of the snackbar.

        BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_SHORT, BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_LONG or BaseTransientBottomBar.LENGTH_INDEFINITE.

        Returns:
        The snackbar with the supplied parameters.

        Use Snackbar.show() to display the snackbar.

      • getSnackbar

        @NonNull
com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(@NonNull
                                                          java.lang.CharSequence text)
        Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

        The background of the snackbar will be the tint background color to blend it smoothly and it will automatically use its tint color for the text and action to provide best visibility.

        Parameters:
        text - The text to show. Can be formatted text.
        Returns:
        The snackbar with the supplied parameters.

        Use Snackbar.show() to display the snackbar.

      • getSnackbar

        @NonNull
com.google.android.material.snackbar.Snackbar getSnackbar​(@StringRes
                                                          int stringRes)
        Make a themed snackbar with text and action.

        The background of the snackbar will be the tint background color to blend it smoothly and it will automatically use its tint color for the text and action to provide best visibility.

        Parameters:
        stringRes - The string resource for the snackbar.
        Returns:
        The snackbar with the supplied parameters.

        Use Snackbar.show() to display the snackbar.
